content: Do the code.cerner.com/developer/... and sandboxcernerhealth.com FHIR sandboxes support standalone launch?

Yes in the sense that you can launch your SMART app outside of the EHR/portal and will get a user login. However, we do not yet support a patient picker (you need to launch standalone and either know the patient/encounter you are interested in or your app works cross-patient)
Yes, I got it to work -- basically as you described (knowing the username/password). Thanks for the response @Kevin Shekleton
